concept.title: Order of DRM events
concept.shortdesc: dispatches digital rights management (DRM) events in response to DRM-related operations such as when new DRM metadata becomes available. Your player can implement actions in response to these events.

conbody.p: To be notified about all DRM-related events, listen for MediaPlayerEvent.DRM_METADATA. dispatches additional DRM events through the DRMManager class.
